abilities.name: Rage
abilities.description: Enter a rage for combat benefits.

abilities.name: Reckless Attack
abilities.description: Attack with advantage, but take attacks with disadvantage.

abilities.name: Danger Sense
abilities.description: Advantage on Dexterity saving throws against visible effects.

abilities.name: Primal Path
abilities.description: Choose a path that defines the nature of your barbarian.

abilities.name: Ability Score Improvement
abilities.description: Improve one ability score of your choice.

abilities.name: Extra Attack
abilities.description: Attack twice, instead of once, whenever you take the Attack action on your turn.

abilities.name: Fast Movement
abilities.description: Your speed increases while not wearing heavy armor.

abilities.name: Path Feature
abilities.description: Gain a new feature related to your chosen Primal Path.

abilities.name: Feral Instinct
abilities.description: Your instincts are so honed that you have advantage on initiative rolls.

abilities.name: Ability Score Improvement
abilities.description: Improve one ability score of your choice.

abilities.name: Brutal Critical (1 die)
abilities.description: You can roll an extra weapon damage die when determining the extra damage for a critical hit with a melee attack.

abilities.name: Path Feature
abilities.description: Gain a new feature related to your chosen Primal Path.

abilities.name: Relentless Rage
abilities.description: If you drop to 0 hit points while raging and don't die, you can make a DC 10 Constitution saving throw. If you succeed, you drop to 1 hit point instead.

abilities.name: Ability Score Improvement
abilities.description: Improve one ability score of your choice.

abilities.name: Brutal Critical (2 dice)
abilities.description: You can now roll two extra weapon damage dice when determining the extra damage for a critical hit with a melee attack.

abilities.name: Path Feature
abilities.description: Gain a new feature related to your chosen Primal Path.

abilities.name: Persistent Rage
abilities.description: Your rage is so fierce that it ends early only if you fall unconscious or if you choose to end it.
